summary: I RECEIVED A NOTICE OF RECALL FOR THE AIR BAGS IN JUNE 2016 AT THAT TIME I WAS TOLD BY NORTH CENTRAL FORD IN RICHARDSON TEXAS THAT I WOULD RECEIVE A LETTER WHEN THEY HAD THE PARTS. OVER A YEAR LATER THEY STILL DO NOT HAVE THE PARTS. I CALLED TODAY AFTER RECEIVING A LETTER STATING I HAD TO HAVE THE REPAIRS MADE BY THE END OF THIS YEAR AND THAT TAKATA HAS FILED BANKRUPTCY. I WAS TOLD AGIN THE EXACT SAME THING THAT THEY DON'T HAVE THE PARTS AND I WILL RECEIVE A LETTER WHEN THEY DO.
